full_output.summary: A passionate and driven beginner developer, I am eager to embark on a rewarding career in the field of software development. With a solid foundation in programming fundamentals and a keen interest in learning new technologies, I am excited to contribute my skills to dynamic projects while continuing to grow and evolve as a developer.

projects.name: Tic Tac Toe
projects.description: Designed a classic Tic Tac Toe game, providing users with an enjoyable and challenging gaming experience against AI or other players online.

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Developed a personal portfolio website showcasing projects and skills using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Also Designed an elegant and intuitive user interface to highlight professional achievements and experiences.

projects.name: Weather App
projects.description: Constructed a weather application utilizing APIs to deliver real-time weather forecasts and updates for locations worldwide, empowering users to plan their activities accordingly.

experiences.company_name: R&D conclave and Women in Stem Workshop
experiences.description: Gained valuable insights into the unique challenges faced by women in STEM and strategies for overcoming them. Actively participated in an R&D conclave aimed at fostering innovation and collaboration within the scientific community. Engaged in discussions and presentations on cutting-edge research and development trends in the field.

experiences.company_name: Problem Solving Questions in DSA Exam
experiences.description: Enhanced problem-solving skills and analytical thinking abilities by applying DSA methodologies to diverse domains and scenarios. Collaborated with peers to tackle diverse problems and share best practices in applying DSAI as a problem-solving tool.

Collaborated with a diverse team of professionals to develop a solution to a real-world problem within a limited timeframe. Contributed to the ideation, design, and implementation phases of the project. Demonstrated strong problem-solving skills and adaptability in a fast-paced and competitive environment.

full_output.name: MANVI JAIN
